overview:
## Discussion

Use this lookup info with [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchShareParticipantsOperation] to fetch the corresponding participant. Once fetched, add the participant to the share to approve the requester.

# participantLookupInfo

**Instance Property**

Lookup information for the requester.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var participantLookupInfo: CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this lookup info with [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchShareParticipantsOperation] to fetch the corresponding participant. Once fetched, add the participant to the share to approve the requester.
title: participantLookupInfo
